document_data.caption: An altar cloth.
document_data.name: Altar Cloth
document_data.mainbody: '''Altar cloths''' were religious items in the Realms carried by [[cleric]]s who used them at altars.
document_data.Description: Altar cloths were typically white and made from [[linen]], velvet, or [[silk]] and some were decorated with gold brocade.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 15 [[gold piece]]s for one made from linen, 30 gold pieces for velvet, 35 for silk, and 40 for gold brocade. Smaller versions suitable for [[altar case]]s cost 3 gold pieces.
document_data.Notable Users: * Altar cloths were favored by clerics and [[priest]]s.
